title: Big Bend National Park
description: In April 2012 my school took a class trip to Big Bend.

photos.description: A stream and some representative landscape.
A deer. Also a cactus to prove this is a southwestern deer.
A cool window in the rocks. I think that's not water on the ground, just very slick rock, so you probably shouldn't walk too close.
A rock on a bigger rock with nice light and shadows.
